fields.name: AccessKey
fields.description: Plaintext access key used to securely access the S3 bucket

fields.name: BucketName
fields.description: The bucket name to sync from the url endpoint for the flux configuration.

fields.name: Insecure
fields.description: Specify whether to use insecure communication when puling data from the S3 bucket.

fields.name: LocalAuthRef
fields.description: Name of a local secret on the Kubernetes cluster to use as the authentication secret rather than the managed or user-provided configuration secrets.

fields.name: SyncIntervalInSeconds
fields.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the cluster bucket source with the remote.

fields.name: TimeoutInSeconds
fields.description: The maximum time to attempt to reconcile the cluster bucket source with the remote.

fields.name: Url
fields.description: The URL to sync for the flux configuration S3 bucket.
